      • mapConsoleToFramebuffer

        public int mapConsoleToFramebuffer(int console)
                            throws LastErrorException
        Identify which framebuffer is connected to a specified VT.
        Parameters:
        console - VT number.
        Returns:
        Framebuffer number or -1 if console has no framebuffer.
